info.name: Enhanced Darkmode | Webnovel
info.description:
That's just an enhanced dark theme. Yes, I know, Webnovel's dark mode is just awful.

By default of the Webnovel, only the reading page has the dark theme, one day I will do it for the other pages. 

How do I activate the theme? 
 - It is necessary to do it manually in the reading page, in the right menu, click on Display Options, and then choose the third option for background.
